synthesis.output: Reorganized the agent package structure by migrating resources into a new `agent/` parent directory, including `skills/`, `tools/`, `plugins/`, and `hooks/`. Successfully moved all files and removed the old empty directories. All tasks were completed and verified with no issues encountered.

Updated `packages/cli/src/commands/install.ts` to modernize all path constants to the `agent/` subdirectory and implemented a new `commands` subcommand. This feature includes help, listing, and installation functionality for command files, complete with support for `--clean` and `--dry-run` flags. The changes were verified for type safety, and no issues were encountered.

Reorganized the `agent/` directory structure by migrating existing skills, tools, plugins, and hooks into a unified hierarchy and verified the migration. The initial stage of the "Agent Package Reorganization" is complete, with subsequent tasks for updating install paths and implementing new opencode commands pending. All migrated files were successfully validated in their new locations.
